GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1959 as a teaching and affiliated University with a National Institute of Higher Education. Reorganized 1971 and 1993. An autonomous institution financed by the State.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate and entrance examination (Prabeshika Parikshya Ra Prabesh Parikshya)

Divisions.College: Animal Science, Veterinary Science and Fisheries

Address.college_name: B.P. Koirala Institute of Health Sciences

GeneralInformation.History: Created 1993 and became an autonomous health sciences university in 1998

AdmissionRequirements: National Examination Board Examination Certificate or equivalent secondary school leaving certificate

Divisions.Details: Manipal College of Medical Sciences, Pokhara; College of Medical Sciences, Bharatpur; Nepalgunj Medical College, Nepalgunj; Kathmandu Medical College, Kathmandu; Nepal Medical College, Kathmandu;  Nobel Medical College,

GeneralInformation.History: Provides postgraduate training and specializations for doctors and nurses.
Founded 1986. Previously known as Mahendra Sanskrit University (Mahendra Sanskrit Vishwavidalaya).

AdmissionRequirements: National Examination Board Examination Certificate or equivalent secondary school leaving certificate for undergraduate studies; Bachelor's degree for Master's degree; Master's or Master of Philosophy for Doctoral studies
12th year senior or intermediate examination or equivalent
